t: Walmart adds Moosejaw to its website, defending itself against Amazon
s: August 27, 2018 - Beginning on Monday, Moosejaw will have its own shop on Walmart's website. The brand, which sells outdoor gear and apparel, was bought by Walmart last year. Walmart is adding more brands and more items to its website, creating its own version of an online shopping mall to compete with Amazon.

t: DICK'S Sporting Goods - DICK'S SPORTING GOODS TO ACQUIRE MOOSEJAW
